main.name: Zoe
main.description: I enjoy working with the front end to create functional, beautiful and responsive websites.
main.bio: I'm a Web Developer who is passionate about learning in and outside of work. I enjoy the process of building something from the ground up, and improving my skills along the way. When I'm not coding, I enjoy reading, yoga, getting into nature, and hanging with my cat, Herman T. Purrman.

education.description: A six month program to learn the basics needed to start in the industry, finishing with creating a fully functional site for a real world client. Since graduating I have done further courses at BCIT in JavaScript, React, PHP and MySQL.

work.title: WordPress Developer
work.description: I am part of the WordPress Development team at xneelo. The team as a whole are creating a hosted WordPress platform, within which my team are building a framework that allows users to create their own custom website. We have created a selection of starter themes that the user can select from and customize. We have also added many options and designs to the WordPress customizer, and built our own Gutenberg blocks plugin containing several custom blocks (built with React). The stack includes PHP, React, SCSS and Docker.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: As a freelancer at a small agency providing custom designed websites, I completed an entire WordPress website for a hotel, and assisted with other projects.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: On the Web Development team, I helped build an entirely new and up to date company website which catalogued over 150 different products. Using Kanban methodology, we created the site using WordPress, JavaScript and SCSS.

projects.title: Pelican Stay
projects.category: A WordPress site for a chain of hotels, which is easy for the client to update.

projects.title: Umaya Resort
projects.category: A WordPress site I created for Another Blank Page, for a hotel resort in Belize.

projects.title: Radial Engineering
projects.category: The company website for Radial Engineering, a brand used widely in the music industry.

projects.title: Check the weather app
projects.category: A basic React app that displays the weather in a city input by the user.
